item.title: Colombia Sends ‘A Poet’ to the Oscars
item.description: Colombia has picked Cannes Un Certain Regard jury prizewinner “A Poet” as its submission to the 98th Academy Awards international feature category. Expressing his delight at the honor, helmer-scribe S
